name: AzureContainerInstanceJobClassic
description: Description of a executable job running as an Azure Container Instance in Omnia Classic. Requiring a predefined subnet.

attributes.name: subnetId
attributes.description: Resource id of the Omnia Classics subnet with ContainerGroup delegation. Connected to a NSG.

attributes.name: logAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceId
attributes.description: Resource id of the Omnia Classics subscription LogAnalyticsWorkspace
